name: POWERGEM_01 - Inter-Dimensional Crystal - Display Version
description:
This POWERGEM will be airdropped for free to the first buyer of POWERGEM_01 - Inter-Dimensional Crystal: https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/365164

_
There are only nine POWERGEMZ in the POWERVERSE. 

The Legends of the Knights Of Saturn depict how, in ancient times, humans could travel between dimensions when holding one POWERGEM in their hands.

These gems occurred naturally in Saaktinor Mohg: a mega-cave found at the bottom of Mount Olympus in Mars, when this ultra-massive mountain used to be an active volcano.

The POWERGEMZ are formations composed of two crystals. Outside, the Niidim-12 crystal serves as an indestructible, transparent, anti-radiation container for the other. The inner crystal's composition is 100% pure Ehxgerath-33, a radioactive element key to unlocking inter-dimensional travel. 

The POWERGEM is safe for humans to hold 

Thanks to the specific conditions Mount Olympus' volcano created and the ultra-rare elements found at Saaktinor Mogh, the POWERGEMZ could form in a way that humans could harmlessly hold. The inner part's radioactive decay is contained in time and space by the external crystalline formation.

Collected and brought to Earth by the Ancient Martian Elders, the POWERGEMZ are now in the hands of a few extraordinary humans.


_
